name: allbookstores.com
description: best place to purchase books on the web
overview:
Allbookstores is an online book market.

Allbookstores offer the most complete listing of places to purchase books on the web. From the most well known stores like Amazon.com & Barnes & Noble to some of the lesser known stores like Powell’s Books.

AllBookstores.com is not a bookstore though, just simply the best place to find the lowest book prices on the web! Our price comparison engine searches more than 30 online bookstores with one click, saving you time and money.

We also offer a free locating service! If you can’t find a particular book by Title, Author, or ISBN, we can try to find it for you. You are never under any obligation to buy, but when you do, we hope you’ll think of us first.
